hero.title: Supercharge your WordPress caching with ValKey
hero.description: The modern, high-performance Redis alternative designed specifically for WordPress. Open-source and backed by the Linux Foundation.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Up to 10x faster than Redis with optimized WordPress-specific caching strategies.

smart.title: Smart Caching
smart.description: AI-powered cache invalidation that learns from your site's traffic patterns.

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.description: Simple installation and configuration. No Redis expertise required.

cost.title: Cost Effective
cost.description: Reduce server costs with efficient memory usage and optimized storage.

security.title: Secure by Default
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with encryption at rest and in transit.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed insights into cache performance and optimization opportunities.

quote1.text: ValKey Cache transformed our site's performance. Load times dropped by 70% overnight.
quote1.author: Jane Smith

quote2.text: The easiest caching solution I've ever used. Perfect for agencies managing multiple sites.

quote3.text: Finally, a caching solution that just works. No more Redis headaches!
quote3.author: Sarah Williams
